text: Hey <!channel> need to know if anyone has worked on direct integration of Salesforce w/ HubDB table, does that work or should i work that out by JSON and API?

Hey <@U86KX1JHH>, welcome! We like to keep @-channel and @-here for broad announcements and emergencies. In answer to your question, I donâ€™t know if anyone has done that yet, but the API would definitely be the way to go.
